alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 7:59PM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WESTERN AND ALL OF CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... .Critical fire weather conditions will return across western and central North Dakota Thursday afternoon and evening. Northwest winds sustained to 35 mph with peak gusts as high as 50 mph are expected. Minimum relative humidity will drop to as low as 20 percent. Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and be difficult to control or suppress. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF WESTERN AND CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * AFFECTED AREA...Central North Dakota. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and become difficult to control or suppress. * AFFECTED AREA...All of western and central North Dakota.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells
